     double myY,
     int myThickness,
     java.awt.Color myColor)
        Creates a new Shape with basic properties.
        Parameters:
        myX - The X Coordinate of the Shape.
        myY - The Y Coordinate of the Shape.
        myThickness - The thickness of the border of the Shape.
        myColor - The color of the Shape.
